Name: Mumps
About the game: «Mumps» — This is a fast, colorful and excellent 2D platformer with a pretty pink pig. The protagonist is a pink pig who called Mumps. Help the Mumps to avoid obstacles, pass all levels and get all the acorns. Feel like a pig and survive by collecting acorns. ● Unlock all Steam achievements. ● Pink platforms disappear when you touch it. ● Avoid Red Spikes. Controls: [Spacebar] or [Mouse click] - Jump [R] - Restart game [P] - Pause
